mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groups ( group_no, title, text, view_count, place_name, place_detail, lat, lng, meeting_date, reg_date ) VALUES ( seq_groups_group_no.nextval, #{title}, #{text}, 0, #{placeName:VARCHAR}, #{placeDetail:VARCHAR}, #{lat:VARCHAR}, #{lng:VARCHAR}, #{meetingDate:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT group_no FROM groups WHERE title=#{title} AND dbms_lob.compare(text, #{text})=0

SELECT j.user_id, g.group_no, g.title, g.text, g.view_count, g.place_name, g.place_detail, g.lat, g.lng, g.meeting_date, g.reg_date, profile_image_file FROM groups g, join j, users u WHERE g.group_no = j.group_no AND j.group_role = 1 AND g.group_no = #{value} AND j.user_id = u.user_id
